reviewtext: It is a label that goes in a brother label printer and it works... not much else to say... so I'll tell you why it is special....1. background sticker.2. special thermal paper3. clear plastic.the thermal print head creates the letters behind the plastic - it does NOT print the letters like a normal printer and this is why the letters don't rub off.  Brilliant idea that no other label maker, to my knowledge does.CONS:The labels are expensive and I have never found and after-market generic alternative.
summary: It is a label that goes in a brother label printer and it works... not much else to say...
